game.name: Deadful Leningrad: Developer Life Simulator
game.shortDescription: Deadful Leningrad: Developer Life Simulator is a game where you are a game developer in CIS. Endure the sphincter-clenching challenge from your crazy boss. Steal weapons, find a graphics card in garbage, vote in elections and don't forget to return CD of your friend. What could possibly go wrong?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Deadful Leningrad: Developer Life Simulator is a game where you are a game developer in CIS. Endure the sphincter-clenching challenge from your crazy boss. Steal weapons, find a graphics card in garbage, vote in elections and don't forget to return CD of your friend. What could possibly go wrong?
